mapper.insert: /* setFormFolder */ INSERT INTO DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_FOLDER ( FORM_COMP_SEQ, FORM_COMP_NAME, FORM_FOLDER_NAME, SORT, REMARK, VISIBLE, ACTIVE, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{formCompSeq}, #{formCompName}, #{formFolderName}, #{sort}, #{remark}, #{visible}, #{active}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.update: /* setFormFolderUpd */ UPDATE DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_FOLDER SET FORM_FOLDER_NAME = #{formFolderName}, SORT = #{sort}, VISIBLE = #{visible}, ACTIVE = #{active}, REMARK = #{remark}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE FORM_FOLDER_ID = #{formFolderId}
mapper.delete: /* setFormFolderDel */ DELETE FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_FOLDER WHERE FORM_FOLDER_ID in (${formFolderId})
mapper.select: /* getDocFormInfoReqOpt */ SELECT FI.FORM_ID, FI.FORM_COMP_NAME, FF.FORM_FOLDER_ID, FF.FORM_FOLDER_NAME, FI.FORM_NAME, FI.ACTIVE, FI.EMAIL_ADDRESS, FI.APPROVER_MARK, FI.SORT, FI.HEADER_CAMPAIGN, FI.FOOTER_CAMPAIGN, FI.FORM_CONTENT, FI.LINKAGE_TYPE, FI.LINKAGE_PROCESS_ID, FI.LINKAGE_POP_ACTIVE, FI.LINKAGE_POP_WIDTH, FI.LINKAGE_POP_HEIGHT, FRO.FORM_REQ_OPT_ID, FRO.PRESERVE_PERIOD, FRO.PUBLIC_TYPE, FRO.URGENT_TYPE, FRO.SECURITY_TYPE, FRO.DOC_GBN FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM FI JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_FOLDER FF ON FI.FORM_FOLDER_ID = FF.FORM_FOLDER_ID LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_REQ_OPT FRO ON FI.FORM_ID = FRO.FORM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND FI.FORM_ID = #{formId}

/* getFormReaderList */ SELECT FORM_ID, SEQ_TYPE, READER_EMP_SEQ, IFNULL(READER_EMP_NAME, READER_DEPT_NAME) AS READER_EMP_NAME, READER_DEPT_SEQ, READER_DEPT_NAME, IFNULL(READER_POSITION_CODE, '-') AS READER_POSITION_CODE, IFNULL(READER_POSITION_NAME, '-') AS READER_POSITION_NAME, IFNULL(READER_DUTY_CODE, '-') AS READER_DUTY_CODE, IFNULL(READER_DUTY_NAME, '-') AS READER_DUTY_NAME FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_READER WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}

/* getFormReceiverList */ SELECT FORM_ID, SEQ_TYPE, RECEIVER_EMP_SEQ, IFNULL(RECEIVER_EMP_NAME, RECEIVER_DEPT_NAME) AS RECEIVER_EMP_NAME, RECEIVER_DEPT_SEQ, RECEIVER_DEPT_NAME, IFNULL(RECEIVER_POSITION_NAME, '-') AS RECEIVER_POSITION_NAME, IFNULL(RECEIVER_DUTY_NAME, '-') AS RECEIVER_DUTY_NAME FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_RECEIVER WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}

/* getFormCustomFieldList */ SELECT FORM_ID, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_EXP, EI.EMP_NAME_KR FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_CUSTOM_FIELD FCF LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO EI ON FCF.REG_EMP_SEQ = EI.EMP_SEQ WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}
mapper.insert:
/* setForm */ INSERT INTO DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM ( FORM_COMP_SEQ, FORM_COMP_NAME, FORM_FOLDER_ID, FORM_NAME, ACTIVE, VISIBLE, EMAIL_ADDRESS, APPROVER_MARK, SORT, HEADER_CAMPAIGN, FOOTER_CAMPAIGN, FORM_CONTENT, LINKAGE_TYPE, LINKAGE_PROCESS_ID, LINKAGE_POP_ACTIVE, LINKAGE_POP_WIDTH, LINKAGE_POP_HEIGHT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{formCompSeq}, #{formCompName}, #{formFolderId}, #{formName}, #{active}, #{visible}, #{emailAddress}, #{approverMark}, #{sort}, #{headerCampaign}, #{footerCampaign}, #{formContent}, #{linkageType}, #{linkageProcessId}, #{linkagePopActive}, #{linkagePopWidth}, #{linkagePopHeight}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'DJ_CAMTIC' AND TABLE_NAME = 'A_FORM'
mapper.update: /* setFormUpd */ UPDATE DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM SET FORM_FOLDER_ID = #{formFolderId}, FORM_NAME = #{formName}, ACTIVE = #{active}, VISIBLE = #{visible}, EMAIL_ADDRESS = #{emailAddress}, APPROVER_MARK = #{approverMark}, SORT = #{sort}, HEADER_CAMPAIGN = #{headerCampaign}, FOOTER_CAMPAIGN = #{footerCampaign}, FORM_CONTENT = #{formContent}, LINKAGE_TYPE = #{linkageType}, LINKAGE_PROCESS_ID = #{linkageProcessId}, LINKAGE_POP_ACTIVE = #{linkagePopActive}, LINKAGE_POP_WIDTH = #{linkagePopWidth}, LINKAGE_POP_HEIGHT = #{linkagePopHeight}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}

/* setFormLinkageProcessUpd */ UPDATE DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM SET LINKAGE_TYPE = '1', LINKAGE_PROCESS_ID = null, LINKAGE_POP_ACTIVE = 'N', LINKAGE_POP_WIDTH = '800', LINKAGE_POP_HEIGHT = '600', MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE LINKAGE_PROCESS_ID IN(${linkageProcessId})
mapper.delete: /* setFormDel */ DELETE FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_UUID AS file_uuid, FILE_PATH AS file_path FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_FILE WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId} AND FORM_FILE_TYPE = #{formFileType} AND FILE_HOST_ADDRESS = #{fileHostAddress}
mapper.delete: /* setTemplateFormFileDelOne */ DELETE FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_FILE WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId} AND FORM_FILE_TYPE = #{formFileType} AND FILE_HOST_ADDRESS = #{fileHostAddress}
mapper.insert: /* setTemplateFormFile */ INSERT INTO DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_FILE ( FORM_ID, FORM_FILE_TYPE, FILE_UUID, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXT, FILE_HOST_ADDRESS, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{formId}, #{formFileType}, #{fileUUID}, #{fileOrgName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExt}, #{fileHostAddress}, #{empSeq} )

/* setFormReqOpt */ INSERT INTO DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_REQ_OPT ( FORM_ID, PRESERVE_PERIOD, SECURITY_TYPE, DOC_GBN, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{formId}, #{preservePeriod}, #{securityType}, #{docGbn}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.delete: /* setFormReqOptDel */ DELETE FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_REQ_OPT WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}
mapper.insert:
/* setFormReader */ INSERT INTO DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_READER ( FORM_ID, SEQ_TYPE, READER_EMP_SEQ, READER_EMP_NAME, READER_DEPT_SEQ, READER_DEPT_NAME, READER_DUTY_CODE, READER_DUTY_NAME, READER_POSITION_CODE, READER_POSITION_NAME, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES
( #{item.formId}, #{item.seqType}, #{item.readerEmpSeq}, #{item.readerEmpName}, #{item.readerDeptSeq}, #{item.readerDeptName}, #{item.readerDutyCode}, #{item.readerDutyName}, #{item.readerPositionCode}, #{item.readerPositionName}, #{item.empSeq} )

/* setFormReaderReceiver */ INSERT INTO DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_RECEIVER ( FORM_ID, SEQ_TYPE, RECEIVER_EMP_SEQ, RECEIVER_EMP_NAME, RECEIVER_DEPT_SEQ, RECEIVER_DEPT_NAME, RECEIVER_DUTY_NAME, RECEIVER_POSITION_NAME, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES
( #{item.formId}, #{item.seqType}, #{item.receiverEmpSeq}, #{item.receiverEmpName}, #{item.receiverDeptSeq}, #{item.receiverDeptName}, #{item.receiverDutyName}, #{item.receiverPositionName}, #{item.empSeq} )

/* setFormCustomField */ INSERT INTO DJ_CAMTIC.A_FORM_CUSTOM_FIELD ( FORM_ID, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_EXP, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES
( #{item.formId}, #{item.fieldName}, #{item.fieldExp}, #{item.empSeq} )
mapper.select: /* getDocFormLinkagePopUrl */ SELECT IFNULL(LINKAGE_PROCESS_NAME, '') AS LINKAGE_PROCESS_NAME, IFNULL(LINKAGE_PROCESS_POPUP_URL, '') AS LINKAGE_PROCESS_POPUP_URL, IFNULL(MAX(LINKAGE_PROCESS_NAME), 0) AS NULL_CHECK FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_LINKAGE_PROCESS WHERE LINKAGE_PROCESS_ID = #{linkageProcessId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_LINKAGE_PROCESS WHERE LINKAGE_PROCESS_CODE = #{linkageProcessCode}

/* getLinkageProcess */ SELECT CASE WHEN #{type} = 'temp' THEN TEMP_PROCESS_URL WHEN (#{type} = 'draft' OR #{type} = 'reDrafting' ) THEN DRAFT_PROCESS_URL WHEN #{type} = 'draftCancel' THEN DRAFT_CANCEL_PROCESS_URL WHEN #{type} = 'retrieve' THEN RETRIEVE_PROCESS_URL WHEN #{type} = 'approve' THEN APPROVE_PROCESS_URL WHEN #{type} = 'return' THEN RETURN_PROCESS_URL WHEN #{type} = 'delete' THEN DELETE_PROCESS_URL WHEN (#{type} = 'finalApprove' OR #{type} = 'finalType1Approve') THEN FINAL_APPROVAL_PROCESS_URL END AS URL FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_LINKAGE_PROCESS WHERE LINKAGE_PROCESS_CODE = #{linkageProcessCode}
mapper.insert: /* setLinkageProcess */ INSERT INTO DJ_CAMTIC.A_LINKAGE_PROCESS ( LINKAGE_PROCESS_COMP_SEQ, LINKAGE_PROCESS_COMP_NAME, LINKAGE_PROCESS_CODE, LINKAGE_PROCESS_NAME, TEMP_PROCESS_URL, DRAFT_PROCESS_URL, DRAFT_CANCEL_PROCESS_URL, RETRIEVE_PROCESS_URL, APPROVE_PROCESS_URL, FINAL_APPROVAL_PROCESS_URL, RETURN_PROCESS_URL, DELETE_PROCESS_URL, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{linkageProcessCompSeq}, #{linkageProcessCompName}, #{linkageProcessCode}, #{linkageProcessName}, #{tempProcessUrl}, #{draftProcessUrl}, #{draftCancelProcessUrl}, #{retrieveProcessUrl}, #{approveProcessUrl}, #{finalApprovalProcessUrl}, #{returnProcessUrl}, #{deleteProcessUrl}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.update: /* setLinkageProcessUpd */ UPDATE DJ_CAMTIC.A_LINKAGE_PROCESS SET LINKAGE_PROCESS_NAME = #{linkageProcessName}, TEMP_PROCESS_URL = #{tempProcessUrl}, DRAFT_PROCESS_URL = #{draftProcessUrl}, DRAFT_CANCEL_PROCESS_URL = #{draftCancelProcessUrl}, RETRIEVE_PROCESS_URL = #{retrieveProcessUrl}, APPROVE_PROCESS_URL = #{approveProcessUrl}, FINAL_APPROVAL_PROCESS_URL = #{finalApprovalProcessUrl}, RETURN_PROCESS_URL = #{returnProcessUrl}, DELETE_PROCESS_URL = #{deleteProcessUrl}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE LINKAGE_PROCESS_ID = #{linkageProcessId}
mapper.delete: /* setLinkageProcessDel */ DELETE FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_LINKAGE_PROCESS WHERE LINKAGE_PROCESS_ID IN(${linkageProcessId})
mapper.insert:
/* setApprovalMng */ INSERT INTO CAM_APPROVAL.DJ_APPROVAL_MNG ( FORM_ID, APPROVAL_TYPE, COPPER_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{formId}, #{approvalType}, #{otherEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_APPROVAL' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_APPROVAL_MNG'

/* setApprovalMngDt */ INSERT INTO CAM_APPROVAL.DJ_APPROVAL_MNG_DT ( FORM_ID, APPROVAL_TYPE,
DUTY_TYPE,
ST_PAY, ED_PAY,
DUTY_VAL ) VALUES ( #{formId}, #{approvalType},
#{dutyType},
#{StPay}, #{EdPay},
#{dutyVal} )
mapper.select: /* getApprovalMngData */ SELECT * FROM CAM_APPROVAL.DJ_APPROVAL_MNG WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}
/* getApprovalMngDtList */ SELECT APPROVAL_MNG_DT, FORM_ID, APPROVAL_TYPE, DUTY_TYPE, DUTY_VAL, ST_PAY, IFNULL(ED_PAY, '') AS ED_PAY FROM CAM_APPROVAL.DJ_APPROVAL_MNG_DT WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}
